meanings.definition: A compound that is a precursor to heme in the body.
meanings.sent1: The doctor explained that protoporphyrin is essential for making heme in our bodies.
meanings.sent2: Scientists are studying the role of protoporphyrin in the production of heme.
meanings.sent3: When the protoporphyrin threw a party, all the heme molecules showed up!
meanings.sent4: The protoporphyrin danced gracefully, knowing it would soon transform into heme.
meanings.sent5: Imagine protoporphyrin as the builder laying the foundation for heme construction.

meanings.definition: A type of porphyrin molecule found in living organisms.
meanings.sent1: The biologist identified protoporphyrin as a common porphyrin in living beings.
meanings.sent2: In nature, protoporphyrin plays a crucial role in various biological processes.
meanings.sent3: The protoporphyrin molecule told a joke to the other porphyrins, making them all laugh.
meanings.sent4: Under the microscope, protoporphyrin shimmered like a precious gem in the cell.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant color of protoporphyrin made it stand out among the other molecules.
